name: Jelly Is Sticky And More
description:
A small fangame of Jelly Is Sticky with ~70 levels. This is primarily made to showcase new game mechanics and different jelly color blocks (grey eyes can wade through other grey blocks, teal turns into white when it's a square, etc.).

Source code is viewable, click "hack"! This was made in Pattern:Script, a puzzlescript mod by clementsparrow.
